T02D1797:11a-1: shr'i gu hya sa m'a dza ma h'a yo ga
T02D1797:11a-2: tantra autp'a da kra ma s'a dha na s'u tra
T02D1797:11a-3: me shra pha ka n'a ma /
T02D1797:11a-5: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i
T02D1797:11a-6: bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i thabs mdo dang bsres
T02D1797:11a-8: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1797:11a-9: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa
T02D1797:11a-10: la rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i sgrub
T02D1797:11a-11: pa la rab tu 'jug pa rnams kyis bskyed pa'i
T02D1797:11a-12: rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1797:11a-13: mdo dang bsres pa zhes bya ba le'u bcu bdun
T02D1797:11a-14: pa las btus te bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1797:11a-15: de la sgrub pa 'os ji skad du le'u bcu gnyis pa las /
T02D1797:11a-16: dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs ni //
T02D1797:11a-17: me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan //
T02D1797:11a-18: ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su //
T02D1797:11a-19: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa 'grub //
T02D1797:11a-20: ces bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig gi
T02D1797:11a-21: tshul gyis rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su sems dpa'i
T02D1797:11a-23: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de le'u gsum pa las /
T02D1797:11a-24: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1797:11a-25: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni //
T02D1797:11a-26: 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po //
T02D1797:11a-28: 'od zer sna lngas kun du khyab //
T02D1797:11a-29: kun nas yongs su zlum po ste //
T02D1797:11a-30: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis brgyan //
T02D1797:11a-31: mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa //
T02D1797:11a-32: mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su //
T02D1797:11a-33: gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya //
T02D1797:11a-34: zhes mdor bsdus te gsungs pa de la dang po
T02D1797:11a-35: kho nar byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i gzugs can
T02D1797:11a-36: zhes bya ba bskyed par bya ba ste /
T02D1797:11a-39: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //
T02D1797:11b-1: zhes gsungs pa 'dis rdo rje 'chang chen po sku
T02D1797:11b-2: mdog dkar por bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin mos
T02D1797:11b-3: par bya'o // de nas le'u dang po las /
T02D1797:11b-4: ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1797:11b-5: gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mi bskyod pa bskyed pas zhe
T02D1797:11b-6: sdang rdo rjer gyur nas le'u bcu gsum pa las
T02D1797:11b-7: / khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes //
T02D1797:11b-8: gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag / sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la //
T02D1797:11b-10: zhes gsungs pas yi ge h'um ring po las khro
T02D1797:11b-11: bo'i rgyal po bcu phyung la le'u bcu bzhi pa
T02D1797:11b-12: las / aom sumbha zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1797:11b-13: gsungs pa'i sngags kyis khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes
T02D1797:11b-14: la bka' bsgo bas phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs bkug
T02D1797:11b-15: nas le'u bcu gsum pa las /
T02D1797:11b-16: yi dam bcas pa rdzogs nas kyang //
T02D1797:11b-17: sngags kyi gnas ni bsrung bar bya //
T02D1797:11b-18: bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di la ni ;
T02D1797:11b-19: / gnas nas sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob //
T02D1797:11b-20: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal chen po //
T02D1797:11b-21: rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom //
T02D1797:11b-23: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gdab par bya //
T02D1797:11b-24: zhes gsungs pa 'dis khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor
T02D1797:11b-25: gyi phur bu rnams kyis aom gha gha zhes bya
T02D1797:11b-26: ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gnod mdzes la bka'
T02D1797:11b-27: bsgo ste phur bu gdab bo //
T02D1797:11b-28: de nas 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis rdo rje rab bsam pa dang /
T02D1797:11b-29: h'um mdzad kyis rdo rje'i dra ba yi ge h'um
T02D1797:11b-30: gis sa'i cha rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsam zhing
T02D1797:11b-31: yi ge gsum gyis go cha la sogs pa bya'o
T02D1797:11b-32: // de ltar phyogs dang mtshams ba cing ba dang
T02D1797:11b-33: rab la sogs pa'i chog srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgoms
T02D1797:11b-35: dngos po med pa sgom pa'i dngos //
T02D1797:11b-36: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
T02D1797:11b-37: de ltar dngos po dngos med pa //
T02D1797:11b-38: bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D1797:11b-39: zhes tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du bsgom mo //
T02D1797:11b-40: de nas le'u bcu gcig pa las /
T02D1797:11b-41: dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes //
T02D1797:11b-42: nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsgom //
T02D1797:11b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas /
T02D1797:11b-44: rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bskyed nas /
T02D1797:11b-45: bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya //
T02D1797:12a-1: ba la sogs pas sa'i cha bskyed la le'u bcu gcig pa las /
T02D1797:12a-2: yi ge bh'um gyis gnas bsgom ste //
T02D1797:12a-3: zhes bya bas gzhal yas khang bsams la /
T02D1797:12a-5: gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan //
T02D1797:12a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas zhes gsungs pa
T02D1797:12a-7: 'dis sna tshogs padma'i steng du zla ba la sogs
T02D1797:12a-8: pa'i gdan gyis brgyan la le'u brgyad pa las /
T02D1797:12a-9: dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam la //
T02D1797:12a-10: gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi //
T02D1797:12a-11: mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa //
T02D1797:12a-12: gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med //
T02D1797:12a-13: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas /
T02D1797:12a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom mo //
T02D1797:12a-15: gnas ni bskyed pa sngon 'gro bas //
T02D1797:12a-16: rdo rje gsum bskyed bsgom par bya //
T02D1797:12a-17: zhes gsungs pas lhag par mos pa can gyi sems
T02D1797:12a-18: kyis bdag nyid rdo rje 'chad nyid du gyur nas
T02D1797:12a-19: / dbus kyi gdan la sems pa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas par bsams nas le'u dang po las /
T02D1797:12a-20: gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1797:12a-21: sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun du khyab //
T02D1797:12a-22: sangs rgyas chogs kyis rab tu rgyas //
T02D1797:12a-23: 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug / ces gsungs
T02D1797:12a-24: pa 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod pa'i ting
T02D1797:12a-25: nge 'dzin gyis dbang du byas te lhag par mos
T02D1797:12a-26: pa la dmigs par stan pa yin no //
T02D1797:12a-27: da ni rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim pa brtsam par bya ste de la le'u bdun pa las /
T02D1797:12a-28: dam tshig khu phyung chog bzhin //
T02D1797:12a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad nas //
T02D1797:12a-31: dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur //
T02D1797:12a-32: zhes gsungs pa 'dis lhag par mos pa'i ting nge
T02D1797:12a-33: 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod pa'i de
T02D1797:12a-34: bzhin gshegs pa rnams phung po la sogs par bsdus
T02D1797:12a-35: te / gzugs phung gtogs dang zhes bya ba la
T02D1797:12a-36: sogs pas don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs la
T02D1797:12a-38: aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1797:12a-40: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1797:12a-41: ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya //
T02D1797:12b-0: zhes gsungs pa 'dis ye shes rgya mtsho'i gzugs su @12b yongs su gyur nas /
T02D1797:12b-1: de nas ldang bar gyur pa ni ye shes rgya
T02D1797:12b-2: mtsho las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du zla
T02D1797:12b-3: ba'i dkyil 'khor yang de'i steng du padma dmar po
T02D1797:12b-4: 'dab ma brgyad pa padma'i steng du yi ge gsum
T02D1797:12b-5: bkod de / de thams cad bsdus te zla ba'i
T02D1797:12b-6: dkyil 'khor 'dra bar yongs su gyur par bltas la
T02D1797:12b-7: bkod de / / de las byung pa'i 'od zer
T02D1797:12b-8: gyi 'phro 'du bskyed nas sems can gyi khams rnams
T02D1797:12b-9: ye shes kyi bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de
T02D1797:12b-10: nyid du rjes su bcu ga la le'u gsum pa
T02D1797:12b-11: bkod de / / las / aom dharma dh'a tu
T02D1797:12b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1797:12b-13: brtan par bya ba 'di ni rnal 'byor te /
T02D1797:12b-15: ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D1797:12b-16: rnal 'byor yin par shes par bya //
T02D1797:12b-18: de la le'u bcu gcig pa las /
T02D1797:12b-19: rdo rje mchog gsum yi ge sngags //
T02D1797:12b-20: phyag rgya chen por rnam bsgom pa //
T02D1797:12b-21: byang chub thams cad thob bya'i phyir //
T02D1797:12b-22: ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya //
T02D1797:12b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas /
T02D1797:12b-24: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge gsum bkod la rdo rje rgyal de las byung ba //
T02D1797:12b-25: rdo rje 'chang chen por bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin bsgom pa ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1797:12b-26: de nas le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i rig pa'i
T02D1797:12b-27: skyes bu gzugs can ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi
T02D1797:12b-28: lus kyis sems can gyi don bya bar mi nus
T02D1797:12b-29: pas na le'u brgyad pa las /
T02D1797:12b-30: nu ma'i bar nas klad pa'i rgya bar du //
T02D1797:12b-31: chog shes pas rkang mthil bar du dgod //
T02D1797:12b-32: lte ba rked pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras //
T02D1797:12b-33: rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya //
T02D1797:12b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1797:12b-35: byin gyis brlabs pas phung po la sogs pa'i ngo
T02D1797:12b-36: bo nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye
T02D1797:12b-37: shes kyi rang bzhin lus la rjes su zhugs par
T02D1797:12b-38: bya'o // de bas na le'u bcu bdun pa las /
T02D1797:12b-39: phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na //
T02D1797:12b-40: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1797:12b-41: rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang //
T02D1797:12b-42: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog / ces gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1797:12b-43: da ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la rjes
T02D1797:12b-44: su zhugs pas zhal gsum lta bus gdul bya rnams
T02D1797:13a-0: kyi don du rdo rje 'chang gi bdag @13a *
T02D1797:13a-2: don 'di nyid bstan pa ni le'u dang po las /
T02D1797:13a-3: rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs
T02D1797:13a-4: pa thams cad kyi bdag po sngags kyis byin gyis
T02D1797:13a-5: brlabs so // bying yis brlabs ma thag tu bcom
T02D1797:13a-6: ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin
T02D1797:13a-7: gshegs pa zhal gsum pa lta bur de bzhin gshegs
T02D1797:13a-8: pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur te zhes gsungs
T02D1797:13a-9: pa ni shin tu rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1797:13a-10: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye
T02D1797:13a-11: shes sems dpa' rjes su zhugs pas sku la sogs
T02D1797:13a-12: pa'i rim pa 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1797:13a-13: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te le'u bcu gcig pa las /
T02D1797:13a-14: rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1797:13a-15: h'um zhes bya ba rab tu bsgom //
T02D1797:13a-16: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1797:13a-17: yi ge aom ni rnam par bsam //
T02D1797:13a-18: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1797:13a-19: yi ge a'a: zhes rnam par bsam //
T02D1797:13a-20: zhes gsungs pa 'dis mgo bo dang lkog ma dang
T02D1797:13a-21: snying ga'i phyogs su yi ge gsum rnam par bkod
T02D1797:13a-22: la / de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs pa'i
T02D1797:13a-23: tshogs kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pa bkug la
T02D1797:13a-25: sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan //
T02D1797:13a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1797:13a-27: rnams kyis gsol ba btab la rjes su'i zhugs nas
T02D1797:13a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin //
T02D1797:13a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1797:13a-31: rnams kyis rigs gsum gyi bdag nyi can du nga
T02D1797:13a-32: rgyal bskyed la le'u drug pa las /
T02D1797:13a-33: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya /
T02D1797:13a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1797:13a-36: rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya
T02D1797:13a-37: ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa
T02D1797:13a-38: ni dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02D1797:13a-39: de nas le'u bcu gnyis pa las /
T02D1797:13a-40: rnam pa mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i //
T02D1797:13a-41: snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang //
T02D1797:13a-42: dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur ba //
T02D1797:13a-43: 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te //
T02D1797:13b-0: dngos grub thams @13b cad 'grub pa'i mchog / dam tshig mchog gis rab tu bya //
T02D1797:13b-1: zhes gsungs pa 'dis dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar
T02D1797:13b-2: ye shes sems dpa' sa bon gyis dgug pa dang
T02D1797:13b-3: / dbu rgyan la rang gi bdag po bsgom mo //
T02D1797:13b-4: de nas le'u bcu gcig pa las /
T02D1797:13b-5: snying gar yi ge h'um bsams nas ;
T02D1797:13b-6: / sems ni thig ler gyur par gzhag / ces
T02D1797:13b-7: gsungs pa 'dis ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar yang
T02D1797:13b-8: snying po yi ge h'um ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'
T02D1797:13b-9: bsgom mo // 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
T02D1797:13b-10: chub kyi go 'phang ni 'dod chags las skye bar
T02D1797:13b-11: 'gyur bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1797:13b-13: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje //
T02D1797:13b-14: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D1797:13b-15: par mdzad pa de bzhin du bskyed bzhin pa la
T02D1797:13b-16: gnas pas dang po'i sbyor ba bya ste /
T02D1797:13b-17: 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'dod pas thar pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1797:13b-19: 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa'i //
T02D1797:13b-20: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D1797:13b-21: nas zhes gsungs pa'i rim pa 'dis le'u bco lnga
T02D1797:13b-22: pa las gsungs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i gdol pa'i
T02D1797:13b-23: bu mo legs par bslabs pa'am /
T02D1797:13b-24: lang na rang gi snying ga nas phyungs te mdun du bzhag la le'u brgyad pa las /
T02D1797:13b-25: nu ma'i bar nas klad pa'i rgyas kyi bar //
T02D1797:13b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas rigs lnga
T02D1797:13b-27: dang bsre ba byas la rdo rje dang padma mngon
T02D1797:13b-28: par 'dus byas pas dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par
T02D1797:13b-30: le'u bdun pa las ji skad du /
T02D1797:13b-31: bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba //
T02D1797:13b-32: lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la //
T02D1797:13b-33: byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis //
T02D1797:13b-34: dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam //
T02D1797:13b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog / spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1797:13b-36: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1797:13b-37: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1797:13b-38: aom zhes pa dang a'a: zhes pas //
T02D1797:13b-39: h'um dang phat du rnam par brtag /'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yi //
T02D1797:13b-40: padma rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02D1797:13b-41: zhes gsungs pa 'dis tha ma la pa'i nga rgyal spangs la /
T02D1797:14a-3: zhes bya ba 'dis thabs kyi rdo rjes mnyes par bya zhing /
T02D1797:14a-4: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas
T02D1797:14a-5: le'u drug pa las gsungs pa'i rjes su chags pa'i
T02D1797:14a-6: sngags brjod la 'khyud pa dpa'o bya ba dang ;
T02D1797:14a-7: gzhib pa la sogs pa byas la yi ge h'um
T02D1797:14a-8: gi glu len cing las la gnas par bsgom mo
T02D1797:14a-9: // 'byin pa'i skabs su phat ces brjod la /
T02D1797:14a-10: byang chub kyi sems kyi rdul phra rab de bzhin
T02D1797:14a-11: gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i 'byung gnas su
T02D1797:14a-12: bsgoms la sngar bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang na gnas
T02D1797:14a-13: par bya'o // de nas don yod pa'i nga rgyal
T02D1797:14a-14: dang ldan pas le'u drug pa las gsungs pa'i mchod
T02D1797:14a-15: pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te gzhung 'di dag
T02D1797:14a-16: gis ni dkyil 'khor gsum sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag
T02D1797:14a-17: par bya'o // nyid can te / bdag gi don
T02D1797:14a-18: phun sum tshogs pa dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya
T02D1797:14a-20: de nas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bya
T02D1797:14a-21: ba'i phyir le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i ye shes
T02D1797:14a-22: sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1797:14a-23: gsangs pa'i tshul gyis mi bskyod pa phyung la des
T02D1797:14a-24: zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yang dag
T02D1797:14a-25: par sbyangs la de bkug nas rang gi lus la
T02D1797:14a-26: bcug na zhe sdang rdo rjer 'gyur ro //
T02D1797:14a-27: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams phyung nas /
T02D1797:14a-28: de rnams kyis gti mug la sogs pa la rjes
T02D1797:14a-29: su dga' ba'i sems can rnams yang dag par sbyangs
T02D1797:14a-30: nas bsdus te ; ye shes kyi 'khor lor rjes
T02D1797:14a-31: su bcug la slar bkug ste gnas ji lta ba
T02D1797:14a-32: bzhin du bkod nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa
T02D1797:14a-33: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting
T02D1797:14a-35: de nas le'u gsum pa las /
T02D1797:14a-36: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
T02D1797:14a-37: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam //
T02D1797:14a-38: sna yi rtse mor nan tan du //
T02D1797:14a-39: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom //
T02D1797:14a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa phra mo'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1797:14a-42: slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te //
T02D1797:14a-43: ma bslangs pa la chags mi bya //
T02D1797:14a-44: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //
T02D1797:14b-0: sngags kyi yan @14b lag ma nyams bzlas //
T02D1797:14b-1: zhes gsungs pa la sogs pas rdo rje'i bzlas pa dran par bya ste /
T02D1797:14b-3: brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni //
T02D1797:14b-4: rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya //
T02D1797:14b-5: zhes bya ba dag gi bzlas brjod byas la nye bar bsdu par bya ste /
T02D1797:14b-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D1797:14b-8: dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mo'i bha ga la
T02D1797:14b-9: bzhugs so // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1797:14b-10: cad kyi btsun mos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1797:14b-11: kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga'
T02D1797:14b-12: bas bstod pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad bya
T02D1797:14b-13: bzhugs so // ste / bdag po rang nyid don dam pa'i bden pa la zhugs la /
T02D1797:14b-14: de nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rab tu bskul ba dang /
T02D1797:14b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis /
T02D1797:14b-16: mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che //
T02D1797:14b-17: zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod pas yang dag par sad par bya ste /
T02D1797:14b-18: cho ga bzhin legs par mchod nas rang gi sku la legs par gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1797:14b-19: de nas le'u bcu pa las /
T02D1797:14b-20: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1797:14b-21: bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1797:14b-22: de yi dbus gnas yi ge h'um //
T02D1797:14b-23: rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag / rdo rje 'od zer rab tu 'bar //
T02D1797:14b-24: rnam par 'phro bar bsam par bya //
T02D1797:14b-25: sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung thugs //
T02D1797:14b-26: snying la de yis rnam bsgoms na //
T02D1797:14b-27: de ma thag tu de 'gyur ba //
T02D1797:14b-28: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1797:14b-29: zhes gsungs pa 'dis yi ge h'um gis nam mkha'i
T02D1797:14b-30: khams yongs su gang ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1797:14b-31: rang bzhin du rnam par bsams la nye bar bsdu
T02D1797:14b-32: bar bya'o // de ltar las dang po pa rnams
T02D1797:14b-33: rab tu 'jug pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa dang
T02D1797:14b-34: bar bya'o // / dbang bskur ba thob pas tha
T02D1797:14b-35: mal pa'i nga rgyal dang bral bas thun bzhir lha'i
T02D1797:14b-36: rnal 'byor la goms pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don
T02D1797:14b-37: phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir las kyi rab
T02D1797:14b-38: tu dbye ba rnams kyang bya'o //
T02D1797:14b-39: rim pa 'di nyid kyis le'u bcu bdun pa las /
T02D1797:14b-40: lus kyi rdo rje kha zas dang //
T02D1797:14b-41: phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1797:14b-42: rdo rje chos la rtag par ni //
T02D1797:14b-43: sngags bton cho ga spyad par bya //
T02D1797:15a-1: ting nge 'dzin 'dis sgrub pa'i thabs las bshad pa'i rim pas kha zas sbyang ba dang /
T02D1797:15a-3: snying ga sbyang bdag byas nas bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i zas kyi bya ba dag kyang bya'o //
T02D1797:15a-4: de nas le'u bcu pa las /
T02D1797:15a-5: sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa //
T02D1797:15a-6: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs //
T02D1797:15a-7: dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis //
T02D1797:15a-8: dngos po thams cad brtag par bya //
T02D1797:15a-9: zhes gsungs pa 'dis rdo rje dang padma yang dag
T02D1797:15a-10: par sbyar bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las thams
T02D1797:15a-11: cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i yi ge gsum gyi sngags
T02D1797:15a-15: nang gi sbyin sreg gis kyang las thams cad rab tu bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1797:15a-16: 'di ni las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o //
T02D1797:15a-17: de ltar mdo dang bsres pa rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D1797:15a-18: da ni mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya ste /
T02D1797:15a-19: de la thog mar gnas nges pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-20: snying rje chen po la dmigs pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-21: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-22: stong pa nyid la dmigs pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-26: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-28: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lo dmigs pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-30: rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-31: sngags kyi byin gyis brlab pas phung po la sogs pa dgang ba dang /
T02D1797:15a-32: sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pa'i 'dus byas pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-33: rdo rje dang padma 'dus byas pa dang ;
T02D1797:15a-34: rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-39: don dam pa la zhugs pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-40: rab tu bskul bas bslang pa dang /
T02D1797:15a-43: las kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams su shes par bya'o //
T02D1797:15a-44: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i
T02D1797:15a-45: bskyed rim gyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdo dang bsres pa
T02D1797:15a-46: zhes bya ba / slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1797:15a-48: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i bha dra
T02D1797:15b-0: dang lo ts'a ba dge slong @15b rin chen bzang
